snippet: President Xi Jinping’s legal overhauls have not resulted in a more humane system, the Amnesty International report contended.
abstract: Amnesty International reports Chinese authorities routinely abuse human rights attorneys and criminal suspects.
lead_paragraph: President Xi Jinping’s legal overhauls have not resulted in a more humane system, the Amnesty International report contended.

headline.main: Rights Lawyers in China Routinely Face Abuse, Report Says
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: Abuse Is Routine, Report Says

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
